Verses: 1 pinbu Avar Ennai Dhevaalayaththirku Azhaiththukkondupoi, Thoonaadhaarangalai Indhappuraththil Aarumuzha Agalamum Andhappuraththil Aarumuzha Agalamumaai Alandhaar; Adhu Vaasasthalaththin Agala Alavaam.

2 vaasal Nadaiyin Agalam Paththumuzhamum Vaasal Nadaiyin Pakkangal Indhappuraththil Aindhu Muzhamum Andhap Puraththil Aindhu Muzhamumaayirundhadhu; Adhin Neelaththai Naarpadhu Muzhamum Agalaththai Irubadhu Muzhamumaaga Alandhaar.
3 pinbu Avar Ullepoi, Vaasal Nadaiyin Thoonaadhaarangalai Irandu Muzhamaagavum, Vaasal Nadaiyai Aarumuzhamaagavum, Vaasal Nadaiyin Agalaththai Ezhumuzhamaagavum Alandhaar.
4 pinbu Avar Dhevaalayaththin Munpuraththile Adhin Neelaththai Irubadhumuzhamaagavum, Adhin Agalaththai Irubadhu Muzhamaagavum Alandhu, Ennai Nokki: Idhu Magaa Parisuththa Sthalam Endraar.
5 pinbu Avar Aalayaththin Suvarai Aaru Muzhamaagavum, Aalayaththai Sutrilum Irundha Sutrukkattinudaiya Agalaththai Naalumuzhamaagavum Alandhaar.

6 indha Sutrukkattugal Pakkakkattinmel Pakkakkattaana Varisaigalaai Muppaththumoondru Irundhadhu; Avaigal Aalayaththin Suvarukkul Oondriyiraamal, Sutrukkattugalukkaaga Sutrilum Avaigal Oondrumpadikku Aalayaththukku Aduththirundha Ottuchchuvarile Paaindhirundhadhu.

7 uyara Uyara Sutrilum Sutrukkattugalukku Agalam Adhigamaayirundhadhu; Aalayaththai Sutrilum Uyara Uyara Aalayaththai Sutri Sutri Agalam Varavara Adhigamaayirundhadhu; Aadhalaal Ivvidhamaaik Keezhnilaiyilirundhu Nadunilaivazhiyaai Melnilaikku Erum Vazhiyirundhadhu.
8 maaligaikku Sutrilum Irundha Uyaraththaiyum Paarththen, Sutrukkattugalin Asthibaarangal Aaru Periya Muzhankonda Oru Muzhakkolin Uyaramaayirundhadhu.
9 purambe Sutrukkattukku Irundha Suvarin Agalam Aindhumuzhamaayirundhadhu. Aalayaththukku Irukkum Sutrukkattugalin Maaligaiyile Verumaiyaai Vittirundha Idangalum Appadiye Irundhadhu.
10 aalayaththai Sutrilum Araiveedugalukku Naduvaaga Irundha Visaalam Irubadhu Muzhamaayirundhadhu.

11 sutrukkattinudaiya Vaasal Nadaigal, Verumaiyaai Vittirundha Idangalilirundhu, Oru Vaasal Nadai Vadakkeyum, Oru Vaasalnadai Therkeyum Irundhadhu; Verumaiyaai Vittirundha Idangalin Visaalam Sutrilum Aindhu Muzhamaayirundhadhu.

12 metrisaiyile Praththiyegamaana Idaththukku Munnirundha Maaligaimattum Agalam Ezhubadhu Muzhamum, Maaligaiyinudaiya Suvarin Agalam Sutrilum Aindhu Muzhamum, Adhinudaiya Neelam Thonnooru Muzhamumaayirundhadhu.
13 avar Aalayaththai Noorumuzha Neelamaagavum, Praththiyegamaana Idaththaiyum Maaligaiyaiyum Adhin Suvargalaiyum Nooru Muzha Neelamaagavum Alandhaar.
14 aalayaththin Murpuramum Kizhakkukku Edhiraana Praththiyegamaana Idamum Irundha Agalam Noorumuzhamumaayirundhadhu.

15 praththiyegamaana Idaththin Pinpuramaaga Adharku Edhire Irundha Maaligaiyin Neelaththaiyum, Adharku Indhappuraththilum Andhappuraththilum Irundha Nadaikaavanangalaiyum Alandhaar; Ullaana Dhevaalayamum Mutraththin Mandabangalum Utpada Noorumuzhamaayirundhadhu.

16 vaasarpadigalum, Odukkamaana Jannalgalum, Moondru Pakkangalil Sutrilum Vaasalgalukku Edhiraana Nadaikaavanangalum Sutrilum Tharaithuvakki Jannalgal Mattaagap Palagai Adiththirundhadhu; Jannalgal Moodappattirundhadhu.
17 vaasalin Melethuvakki Aalayaththin Utpuramum Velippuramum Sutrilum Suvarin Utpuramum Velippuramum Ellaam Alavittirundhadhu.
18 kerubeengalum Pereechchamarangalum Siththirikkappattirundhadhu; Kerubeenukkum Kerubeenukkum Naduvaaga Ovvoru Pereechchamaram Irundhadhu; Ovvoru Kerubeenukkum Irandirandu Mugangal Irundhadhu.
19 pereechchamaraththukku Indhandaiyil Manushamugamum, Pereechchamaraththukku Andhandaiyil Singamugamum Irundhadhu; Ippadi Aalayaththai Sutrilum Seydhirundhadhu.
20 tharaithuvakki Vaasalin Merpuramattum, Dhevaalayaththin Suvarilum, Kerubeengalum Pereechchamarangalum Siththirikkappattirundhadhu.
21 dhevaalayaththin Kadhavu Nilaigal Sadhuramum, Parisuththa Sthalaththinudaiya Mugappin Uruvam Andha Uruvaththukku Sariyumaayirundhadhu.

22 maraththinaal Seyyappatta Palipeedaththin Uyaram Moondru Muzhamum, Adhin Neelam Irandu Muzhamumaayirundhadhu; Adhin Kodigalum Adhin Vilimbugalum Adhin Pakkangalum Maraththinaal Seyyappattirundhadhu; Avar Ennai Nokki: Idhu Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyilirukkira Peedam Endraar.
23 dhevaalayaththukkum Parisuththa Sthalaththukkum Irandu Vaasalgalum,
24 vaasalgalukku Madakkuk Kadhavugalaagiya Rattaik Kadhavugalum Irundhadhu; Vaasalukku Irandu Kadhavugalum Matra Vaasalukku Irandu Kadhavugalum Irundhadhu.

25 suvargalil Siththirikkappattirundhadhupol Aalayaththinudaiya Kadhavugalilum Kerubeengalum Pereechchamarangalum Siththirikkappattirundhadhu; Purambe Mandabaththin Munbaaga Uththirangal Vaiththirundhadhu.
26 mandabaththin Pakkangalil Indhappuraththilum Andhappuraththilum, Aalayaththin Sutrukkattugalilum Odukkamaana Jannalgalum Siththirikkappatta Pereechchamarangalum Uththirangalum Irundhadhu.
